appType.description: The type of app. Valid values are `JupyterServer`, `KernelGateway`, `RStudioServerPro`, `RSessionGateway` and `TensorBoard`.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the app.

resourceSpec.description: The instance type and the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SageMaker image created on the instance.See Resource Spec below.

spaceName.description: The name of the space. At least one of `user_profile_name` or `space_name` required.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

userProfileName.description: The user profile name. At least one of `user_profile_name` or `space_name` required.
